Top Entries (Bayesian)

Below is a Bayesian ranked list of entries for this site, which allows you to see the highest rated entries for this site. It factors in a special weighting system (Bayesian) that makes calculations on ratings across your site and ranks them a little differently. For example, an entry with an average rating of 4.6 out of 5 from 25 ratings will likely appear above an entry with an average rating of 5 out of 5 from 3 ratings.

About This Page

The "Top Entries (Bayesian)" page displays a ranked list of your highest rated entries. It factors in a special weighting system (Bayesian) that makes calculations on ratings across your site and ranks them a little differently. For example, an entry with an average rating of 4.6 out of 5 from 25 ratings will likely appear above an entry with an average rating of 5 out of 5 from 3 ratings.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • Rating:Rank with orderby="bayesian:rating" parameter to display a ranked weighted list of rated entries.
  • Rating:Stats to display stats about ratings for each entry.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • Query Module to create and display a list of authors.
